sourceOfFunds.purpose: From the total Rs.20, 45,000sanctioned for three years,Rs10, 04,600 was released for year1 in July2013.Purchase of equipment (Rs.5.0lakhs) wasdeferred to year2 to identify newer model.Due to staff recruitment delays based on University procedures, utilization of recurring expenditure to be only Rs3, 92,375 out of Rs.5, 04,600 released. Total unutilized amount of Rs8, 92,375 was sought to be carried over to year2.

Besides theunspent amount of Rs.8,92,375sought to be carried over from year1,the year 2 activities were sustained with DBT release of Rs.4,47,300,against originally sanctioned amount of Rs.5,04,600.While Rs3,75,000 was utilised for equipment purchase, Rs.1.25 lakhs remained unspent in non-recurring expenditure. The total utilised funds for 2015-16 was Rs.9, 91, 171, including recurring expenditure of Rs.6, 16,171.

In year 3, although the originally sanctioned amountwasRs5, 35,800, no release of funds, in spite of our repeated reminders/requests.To sustain the activities, a loan of Rs.1, 47, 066 was given by SABRC and together with carried over amounts an amount of Rs.4, 95,570 was expended. This was duly reported and request for releasing the pending sanctioned amount was made to DBT.

The final year expenditure, including six month extension period (4Jul.2016 -3 Jan.2017) was Rs:2,98,102,while DBT only released Rs:1,49,000. The overall negative balance for entire project duration was Rs:2, 89,008, since DBT payments totalled Rs:16,00,900, against Rs:18,97,068 actually spent. This amount (Rs:2,89,008) availed as goodwill loan is to be reimbursed to SABRC. Chennai, which is within the total sanctioned amount of Rs:20,45,000.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: This year 2018 we have supplied the multiple micronutrient enriched cooking salt free of cost,for 1year, to 15000 families benefiting 70000 people. Since the poor use crystal salt predominantly, we have developed for the first time in the world, crystal cooking salt enriched with iron,iodine,B12, folic acid and zinc, which we use as a tool to fight hidden hunger successfully in rural villages and urban slums. Our enriched salt has been scientifically proven to reduce micronutrient deficiencies.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: In this project the multiple micronutrient fortified salt was given free to the parents of the 876 children who attended the primary school Sevalaya. When used in daily cooking the fortified salt provided iron, iodine, vitamin B12, folic acid and zinc to the entire family. The families were provided 1kilogram of salt per month for 4 months. 3100 kilograms of salt was distributed to the families over a period of 4 months and at the end the parents said that they and their children felt healthier

The multiple micronutrient fortified salt enriched with iron, iodine, B12, folic acid , zinc and vitamin was provided to the employees of Brake parts India Pvt Ltd. 600 kilograms of the fortified salt was sent which benefited 100 employees for 6 months.

The multiple micronutrient fortified salt enriched with iron, iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc was provided to 20 families of the students attending the primary school for 4 months.80 kilograms of the fortified salt was provided to the 20 families totally (1kg per family per month for 4 months). The parents and the children reported feeling healthier after using the salt for 4 months.

Mr BB Ramiah, former Union minister of Commerce gave the donation . 600 kilograms of the multiple micronutrient fortified salt was sent to Kolli hills where it was distributed to 80 tribal families for 8 months( 1kilogram per family for 8 months). The project was executed by the MSSRF team in Namakal.

600 kilograms of the salt fortified with iron,iodine B12, folic acid ,zinc and vitamin A was given to the parents of children studying from 6th to 9th standard, after showing an educational film "salt of life" on the role of micronutrients in human health. The fortified salt was distributed after this awareness generation.

600 kilograms of the salt fortified with iron,iodine B12, folic acid ,zinc and vitamin A was given to the women factory workers. The workers were shown a educational film called " Salt of life" in marathi to create awareness on hidden hunger and how it could be combated using the fortified salt. The salt distribution commenced after that.

The money was received in march 2018, hence the project was executed in the next financial year . 120 poor families living in the slums of Patinampakkam are provided the fortified crystal salt enriched with iron, iodine, B12, folic acid , zinc and vitamin A. Each family is provided one kilogram of salt for one year. 360 kilograms of salt is sent to Patinampakam once in 3 months. The families are handed 3 kgs of salt , their salt requirement for 3 months. This is done 4 times a year.

500 families in the villages of Brahmasandra and Chinnenahalli in Tumkur district were provided with the multiple micronutrient powder salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid ,zinc and vitamin A, as well as crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc. BAIF karnataka was the executing agency. The people reported feeling healthy and stated that the visits to the hospitals had reduced considerably. This may be due to improvement in their immune system.

600 kilograms of the multiple micronutrient fortified powder salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid ,zinc and vitamin A was sent to the Weikfield factory in Pune to be distributed among their workers to improve their micronutrient status. The women workers were first shown an awareness film called Salt of life in marathi about the role of micronutrients in human health and how hidden hunger due to micronutrient deficiencies could be overcome by the use of the fortified salt.

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 4000 families in villages in Tirunelveli district through Amar Seva Sangam. Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 1 year. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 4000 families and their 16000 family members.

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 1231 Self help group member families in villages in Dindigul

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 2000 families in the slums of Vysarpadi through Ekam Foundation and Aarvam BSAC. Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 6 months. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 8000 people

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 1340 self help group member families through India Nirman Sangh. Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 1 year. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 5500 people.

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 2000 families in villages near Poompuhar through MS Swaminathan Research Foundation .Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 1 year. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 8000 people.

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 80 families in villages in Tirunarayur near Sirkazhi through Satya Sai Seva Samiti .Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 1 year. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 350 people.

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 1500 families in villages in Tiruvallar district through the students attending the school Sevalaya. Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 1 year. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 6000 people.

The money was received in march 2018 and hence the project commenced in the next financial year only. The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 400 families in Virugambakkam, through the students attending the Kaveri school run by Stree Seva Mandir. Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 1 year. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 1600 people.

The multiple micronutrient fortified crystal salt enriched with iron,iodine, B12, folic acid and zinc is being supplied free of cost to 200 families in Brahmasandra and Chinnenahalli and to 600 families of self help group members in Tiptur. Each family is supplied 1kg of the fortified salt per month for a period of 5 months. This project will improve the micronutrient status of 3200 people. This project is implemented by BAIF Karnataka.In Brahmasandra the project is in the second year.
